title: Twitch to Max/MSP
description: A Node.js script + Max/MSP patch that pulls messages from Twitch, analyzes the structure, and converts into MIDI notes.

title: Inclined Inclinations
description: A wonky creative prompt generator using Compromise.js. Imagine a series of hats with words and grammatical structures, then randomly picking from each hat.
